segments.text: Good afternoon , CCL press.Jennisse speaking , How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon , I'm looking for Mr . Alert Li .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry . Mr.Li is in a meeting right now . Can I take a message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . This is Nigel Smith his personal banker . Could you ask him to return my call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nigel Smith . Does he have your number , Mr . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 2781703 1 . Sure . I'll make sure he gets the message .
